summary:
Global experience in corporate strategy and management consulting for leading companies in tech, electronics, consulting and other industries. Currently based in Europe, spent 5 years living and working in Asia. Project locations include the US, Europe, China, India, South East Asia and Korea.

With Signify's corporate strategy team in Amsterdam, responsible for strategic direction, growth projects, and strategy execution. Signify, formerly known as Philips Lighting, is the world leader in lighting products, systems and services.

Previously at Samsung's Global Strategy Group in Korean HQ, led project teams across businesses and regions, including Mobile, Consumer Electronics and Semiconductors. Solved business challenges for executive management in Asia, Europe and the US. Prior work experience in management consulting at Roland Berger's Amsterdam office.

MBA graduate from INSEAD Singapore. Graduated (MSc) in Business Economics from the University of Amsterdam, with electives in China Studies in Hong Kong.

The Group Strategy team (part of Strategy & Sustainability) sets the company's strategic direction, drives growth strategies across innovation and sustainability, and supports strategy execution. Delivering projects in corporate strategy, strategic planning, strategy execution, implementation, program management, business development and M&A. Partnering with stakeholders in our Leadership Team, Supervisory Board, Divisions, Markets, and Functions.

Managing multiple projects/people.
